ðŸ“– Summary: Lapce is a lightning-fast and powerful code editor written in Rust, utilizing technologies like Rope Science and wgpu for performance. It offers features like built-in LSP support, modal editing (Vim-like), remote development capabilities inspired by VSCode, plugin support via WASI, and an integrated terminal.
